about_the_game:
CONTROLS
Mouse - Tap & Drag
Keyboard - WASD / Space / ESC


Satisfy your customers by enriching their food with your nutritious & delicious futanari sauce!

Futanari di Funghi is a lewd waitressing game, bringing in extra flavour with interactive sauce pouring sections and light visual novel elements.
Featuring lewd scenes illustrated in stylized pixel art.

Every meal in this exquisite ristorante needs its special sauce topping.
If you empty up the whole jar mid-shift, our waitress Pipina will have to provide her very own sauce to fill it up again on the spot.

By inserting a magical mushroom from the land of the Funghi, Pipina is able to grow a stunningly sauce-packed shroom-like member of her own.
Squeeze out as much as you can and keep the orders coming!

At times it may be a demanding job for her, but seeing the smiles of her grateful guests makes it all worthwhile!



FEATURES:
-Unlock animations of fantastic Futanari Funghi
-Serving food against the clock, with a combo-based scoring system
-Crisp and sexy pixel art
-Player controlled lewd animations, essential for replenishing the most needed in-game resource
-Gallery Mode: For when you need to take 5
-Fun & lighthearted sub-story
-Milk your sause and keep up with demand while still satisfying the customers!
-Funiculi Funicula

content_descriptors.notes:
Futanari di Funghi contains the following content:
-Risque outfits, sexual comments and adult situations
-Nudity (Full Frontal, suggesting and partial)
-Sex Scenes (Blowjobs, consensual sex, in a vanilla setting, public nudity and sex with fantasy characters.
-Consumption of sexual fluids
-All characters in Futanari di Funghi are 18+ and over

name: Futanari di Funghi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.2ghz
  • Graphics: 512 mb Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition
